    • Constructor Detail

      • BTOApplication

        public BTOApplication​(Applicant applicant,
                      BTOProject project,
                      FlatType flatType)
        Constructor to initialise the BTOApplication object with common attributes.
        Parameters:
        applicant - The applicant associated with this application.
        project - The BTO project associated with this application.
        flatType - The type of flat applied for (e.g., 2-room, 3-room).

      • BTOApplication

        public BTOApplication​(int applicationId,
                      Applicant applicant,
                      ApplicationStatus status,
                      BTOProject project,
                      FlatType flatType,
                      Date applicationDate,
                      Date bookingDate)
        Constructor to import a BTOApplication object. This is ONLY called during ApplicationDB.readFromCSV()
        Parameters:
        applicationId - The unique identifier for the application.
        applicant - The applicant associated with this application.
        status - The current status of the application (e.g., Pending, Successful, Unsuccessful, Booked, Withdrawn).
        project - The BTO project associated with this application.
        flatType - The type of flat applied for (e.g., 2-room, 3-room, etc.).
        applicationDate - The date the application was submitted.
        bookingDate - The date the booking was made (if applicable).

    • Method Detail

      • getApplicationId

        public int getApplicationId()
        Gets the application ID.
        Returns:
        The unique identifier for the application.

      • getApplicant

        public Applicant getApplicant()
        Gets the applicant associated with this application.
        Returns:
        The applicant associated with this application.

      • getStatus

        public ApplicationStatus getStatus()
        Gets the current status of the application.
        Returns:
        The current status of the application (e.g., Pending, Successful, Unsuccessful, Booked, Withdrawn).

      • setStatus

        public void setStatus​(ApplicationStatus status)
        Sets the status of the application.
        Parameters:
        status - The new status of the application.

      • getProject

        public BTOProject getProject()
        Gets the BTO project associated with this application.
        Returns:
        The BTO project associated with this application.

      • setProject

        public void setProject​(BTOProject project)
        Sets the BTO project associated with this application.
        Parameters:
        project - The new BTO project associated with this application.

      • getFlatType

        public FlatType getFlatType()
        Gets the type of flat applied for.
        Returns:
        The type of flat applied for (e.g., 2-room, 3-room, etc.).

      • getApplicationDate

        public Date getApplicationDate()
        Gets the date the application was submitted.
        Returns:
        The date the application was submitted.

      • getBookingDate

        public Date getBookingDate()
        Gets the date the booking was made (if applicable).
        Returns:
        The date the booking was made (if applicable).

      • approve

        public boolean approve()
                throws IllegalStateException
        Approves the application by updating its status to SUCCESSFUL. Only the HDB Officer / Manager can approve an application.
        Returns:
        true if the application is successfully approved, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException

      • reject

        public boolean reject()
        Rejects the application by updating its status to UNSUCCESSFUL. Only the HDB Officer / Manager can approve an application.
        Returns:
        true if the application is successfully rejected, false otherwise.

      • withdraw

        public boolean withdraw()
        Withdraws the application by updating its status to UNSUCCESSFUL.
        Returns:
        true if the application is successfully withdrawn, false otherwise.

      • book

        public boolean book​(Date bookingDate)
        Books the application by updating its status to BOOKED.
        Parameters:
        bookingDate - The date the booking was made.
        Returns:
        true if the application is successfully booked, false otherwise.

      • unbook

        public boolean unbook()
        Un-book the application by updating its status to UNCESSFUL, and incrementing the flatCountRemaining of the project.
        Returns:
        true if the application is successfully un-booked, false otherwise.
